title: mongo备份数据
text: mongo数据库的备份是必须要做的，这里记录下自己备份数据的脚本 mongo备份脚本cat /data/backdb/back_up.sh 123456789101112131415## declare an array variabledeclare -a db_arr=( "testA" "testB")db_bk=/data/backdb/## now loop through the above arrayfor i in "${db_arr[@]}"do echo "start to dump " $i mongodump -h 192.168.0.1:20000 -d $i -o $db_bk echo "end" # or do whatever with individual element of the arraydone 设置定时任务12345chmod +x ./backup.shcrontab -lcrontab -e40 22 * * * /data/lpf/test/backup.sh //每天22点40执行脚本
